summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3230 for the improvement of West 45th Street, from 3rd Avenue Northwest to 11th Avenue Northwest, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 40071, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
